description: Numbers n such that 666*n + 1 is prime.
links: Vincenzo Librandi, Table of n, a(n) for n = 1..1000
mathematica: f[n_]:=666*n+1; lst={};Do[p=f[n];If[PrimeQ[p],AppendTo[lst,n]],{n,0,6!}];lst (* _Vladimir Joseph Stephan Orlovsky_, Jul 02 2009 *)Select[Range[3, 1000], PrimeQ[666 # + 1] &] (* _Vincenzo Librandi_, May 19 2014 *)
author: _G. L. Honaker, Jr._
extensions: More terms from Michel ten Voorde (seqfan(AT)tenvoorde.org)
